{{Wired embedded system |brand=Check Point |model=U-5 |revision= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lanner |manuf_model=MB-7520 |manuf_rev=V1.0 |availability=End of Support Life |price=3500 |est_release_date=02/2009 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Celeron |cpu1_model=M (LE80535);LE80535VC600512 (SL8FN); |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST49LF008A |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=SODIMM |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1, Mini PCI, SATA, CompactFlash |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (9600 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=82562;EP82562ET; |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=82574L;WG82574L; |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=82574L;WG82574L; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I/O Controller;Intel;82801FBM;;1;,,, LPC I/O Controller;Winbond;W83627THG;;1;,,, Graphics and Memory Controller;Intel;82910GMLE;;1;,,, 8K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25080A;;4;,,, 1K 3-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C46D;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;2;,,, Programmable Timing Control Hub;Renesas;ICS954201BGLF;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 3A, 18V,<!--340KHz--> Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1484EN;;3;,,, Hex Inverting Schmitt Trigger w/ 5V Tolerant Input;NXP;74LVC14AD;;1;,,, 10A, 30V N-Channel PWM Optimized MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS4410;;3;,,, 2A, 20V PNP Medium Power Transistor;Nexperia;BCP69;;4;,,, 3A Source/Sink DDR terminator Regulator;TI;TPS51100;;1;,,, 6A, 21V, 600kHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8666DN;;2;,,, Low Voltage Quad Buffer;Fairchild;SN74LCX125;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, Low Skew Output Buffer;ICS;ICS9112-16;;1; |flags=metal case, heat sink |stock_boot=BIOS;686AMABIOS;<!--CheckPoint Software Technologies LTD-->Rev:U-5-1.2; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.18-92cp; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:90:0B }} {{TagLine|Check Point U-5 Security Appliance}} :[https://downloads.checkpoint.com/fileserver/SOURCE/direct/ID/10947/FILE/CP_UTM-1_GettingStartedGuide.pdf Getting Started Guide]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] M @600MHz :LE80535VC600512 ([https://www.cpu-world.com/sspec/SL/SL8FN.html SL8FN]) *Storage: 1MB BIOS Flash, :160GB WD SATA Disk, CompactFlash *Memory: 1GB (DDR2) SODIMM RAM *Network: 4x GbE, 1x FE ports *USB: 2x USB 1.1 ports *PCI: 1x Mini PCI slot *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Check Point U-5 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point U-5 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
